commit.message:
re PR libstdc++/40691 (bug in logical not operator for valarray used with slice)

	PR libstdc++/40691
	* include/bugs/valarray-after.h (_Expr::operator!): Fix return type.
	* testsuite/26_numerics/valarray/40691.cc: New test.

From-SVN: r149393
